content.text:
# Draft:King Jeff

----
Oche Jeff Daniel (born March 24, 1992), known professionally as King Jeff, is a Nigerian singer, songwriter, recording artist and music producer.
King Jeff was born and raised in Adoka, Otukpo local government area of Benue State, Nigeria. He started his music career in late 2013 as a gospel artist and became a music producer in 2019 when he moved to Lagos to master his craft.
In 2021, King Jeff switched to circular music after which he released his first EP "Chains On Me" which includes two other singles__"Idoma Queen" and "Mah Fault"__.
In 2024, King Jeff started working with Kizzy Clemzy Entertainment as a music producer, he got a record deal offer and was signed to the label as their official artist in 2025, after which he released his hit single "Eli Jah".
